newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0810 CDT.
LIVE CATTLE - Steady to up 0.100 cent. Cash markets strong but scale up commercial hedge selling seen.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to up 0.100 cent. Cash markets strong and index up. Corn futures may influence market.
LEAN HOGS - Off 0.100 to 0.200 cent. Weaker than expected pork and live markets, rain boosting hog runs.
PORK BELLIES - Off 0.200 to 0.500 cent. Break in cash market and weak close, but little product going into storage.
